com.huawei.android.app.admin

类 HwMailProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.huawei.android.app.admin.HwMailProvider

  • public class HwMailProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Public interface for delivering Email exchange parameters.

      void setIncomingusername(java.lang.String incomingusername)
      Set incomingusername for HwMailProvider, Usually to be set as "$user" which means the string before the "@" sign in the email address the user entered, and incomingusername could be to set actual value according to your exchange server.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setId

        public void setId(java.lang.String id)
        Set id for HwMailProvider, must be same with label. Note: id must not be null, otherswise a IllegalArgumentException will be thrown in configExchangeMailProvider.
        参数:
        id - a unique id of current exchange, e.g "hotmail".

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()

      • setLabel

        public void setLabel(java.lang.String label)
        Set label for HwMailProvider, must be same with id. Note: label must not be null, otherswise a IllegalArgumentException will be thrown in configExchangeMailProvider.
        参数:
        label - a label id of current exchange, like "hotmail".

      • getLabel

        public java.lang.String getLabel()

      • setDomain

        public void setDomain(java.lang.String domain)
        Set domain for HwMailProvider, the string after the "@" sign in the email address the user entered. One domain could be corresponding to only one group exchange parameters, which means if you use domain to call configExchangeMailProvider with a new exchange parameters(id/label/incominguri/incomingusername/field/outgoinguri/outgoingusername), the old exchange patameters would be replaced by new one. Note: domain must not be null, otherswise a IllegalArgumentException will be thrown in configExchangeMailProvider.
        参数:
        domain - a domain id of current exchange, like "hotmail.com".

      • getDomain

        public java.lang.String getDomain()

      • setIncominguri

        public void setIncominguri(java.lang.String incominguri)
        Set incominguri for HwMailProvider, which means receive address of your exchange server. Incoming uri could be added to your exchange server, valid incoming uri schemes are: eas Exchange ActiveSync with no transport security. eas+tls+ EAS with required TLS transport security. If TLS is not available the connection fails. eas+ssl+ EAS with required SSL transport security. If SSL is not available the connection fails. To the above schemes you may also add "trustallcerts" to indicate that, although link encryption is still required, "non-trusted" certificates may will be excepted. For example, "eas+ssl+trustallcerts://m.hotmail.com", this should be set according to your exchange server. Currently, we do not support port setting, and use ports with incominguri would cause a connectioni fails. The default port is 80, and the port is 443 when using SSL, the Email will add this port, so you don't need to add a port to incominguri. Note: incominguri must not be null, otherswise a IllegalArgumentException will be thrown in configExchangeMailProvider.
        参数:
        incominguri - , your receive address.

      • getIncominguri

        public java.lang.String getIncominguri()

      • setIncomingusername

        public void setIncomingusername(java.lang.String incomingusername)
        Set incomingusername for HwMailProvider, Usually to be set as "$user" which means the string before the "@" sign in the email address the user entered, and incomingusername could be to set actual value according to your exchange server. Note: incomingusername must not be null, otherswise a IllegalArgumentException will be thrown in configExchangeMailProvider.
        参数:
        incomingusername - , username like "$user" or others.

      • getIncomingusername

        public java.lang.String getIncomingusername()

      • setIncomingfield

        public void setIncomingfield(java.lang.String incomingfield)
        Set incomingfield for HwMailProvider, Incomingfield could be set empty string if you do not use it. For example, "" or "China". Note: incomingfield must not be null, otherswise a IllegalArgumentException will be thrown in configExchangeMailProvider.
        参数:
        incomingfield - , field to set according to your exchange server.

      • getIncomingfield

        public java.lang.String getIncomingfield()

      • setOutgoinguri

        public void setOutgoinguri(java.lang.String outgoinguri)
        Set outgoinguri for HwMailProvider, should be same with incominguri. Note: outgoinguri must not be null, otherswise a IllegalArgumentException will be thrown in configExchangeMailProvider.
        参数:
        outgoinguri - , like "eas+ssl+trustallcerts://m.hotmail.com".

      • getOutgoinguri

        public java.lang.String getOutgoinguri()

      • setOutgoingusername

        public void setOutgoingusername(java.lang.String outgoingusername)
        Set outgoingusername for HwMailProvider, usually to be set as "$user" which means the string before the "@" sign in the email address the user entered, and outgoingusername could be to set actual value according to your exchange server. Note: incomingusername must not be null, otherswise a IllegalArgumentException will be thrown in configExchangeMailProvider.
        参数:
        outgoingusername - , username like "$user" or others.

      • getOutgoingusername

        public java.lang.String getOutgoingusername()
